verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> that Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was told, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your father is sick. <S%H1><s%>" So he took <S%H2470><s%> his two <S%H3947><s%> sons <S%H8147><s%> Manasseh <S%H1121><s%> and Ephraim <S%H4519><s%> with him.

When it was told <S%H5046><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to you," Israel <S%H3478><s%> collected <S%H2388><s%> his strength <S%H2388><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> up in the bed. <S%H4296><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me at Luz <S%H3870><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> me,

and He said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will make <S%H6509><s%> you fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and numerous, <S%H7235><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a company <S%H6951><s%> of peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession. <S%H272><s%>'

"And now <S%H6258><s%> your two <S%H8147><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> to you in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> are mine; Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> shall be mine, as Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and Simeon <S%H8095><s%> are.

"But your offspring <S%H4138><s%> that have been born <S%H3205><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them shall be yours; they shall be called <S%H7121><s%> by the names <S%H8034><s%> of their brothers <S%H251><s%> in their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

"Now as for me, when I came <S%H935><s%> from Paddan, <S%H6307><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> to my sorrow, <S%H5921><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> on the journey, <S%H1870><s%> when there was still <S%H5750><s%> some <S%H3530><s%> distance <S%H3530><s%> <S%H776><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath; <S%H672><s%> and I buried <S%H6912><s%> her there <S%H8033><s%> on the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%> (that is, Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>)."
When Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Joseph's sons, <S%H1121><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> are these <S%H428><s%>?"

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, "They are my sons, <S%H1><s%> whom <S%H1121><s%> God <S%H834><s%> has given <S%H430><s%> me here. <S%H5414><s%>" So he said, <S%H2088><s%> "Bring <S%H559><s%> them to me, please, <S%H3947><s%> that I may bless <S%H4994><s%> them."

Now the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were [so] dim <S%H3513><s%> from age <S%H2207><s%> [that] he could <S%H3201><s%> not see. <S%H7200><s%> Then Joseph brought <S%H5066><s%> them close <S%H5066><s%> to him, and he kissed <S%H5401><s%> them and embraced <S%H2263><s%> them.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "I never <S%H3808><s%> expected <S%H6419><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has let me see <S%H7200><s%> your children <S%H2233><s%> as well. <S%H1571><s%>"
Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took <S%H3318><s%> them from his knees, <S%H1290><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> with his face <S%H639><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them both, <S%H8147><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> with his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> toward <S%H4480><s%> Israel's left, <S%H8040><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> with his left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> toward <S%H4480><s%> Israel's right, <S%H3225><s%> and brought <S%H5066><s%> them close <S%H5066><s%> to him.

But Israel <S%H3478><s%> stretched <S%H7971><s%> out his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and laid <S%H7896><s%> it on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was the younger, <S%H6810><s%> and his left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> on Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'s head, <S%H7218><s%> crossing <S%H9603><s%> his hands, <S%H3027><s%> although <S%H3588><s%> Manasseh was the first-born.

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "The God <S%H430><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> my fathers Abraham <S%H1><s%> and Isaac <S%H85><s%> walked, <S%H3327><s%> The God <S%H1980><s%> who has been my shepherd <S%H430><s%> all <S%H7462><s%> <S%H4480><s%> my life <S%H5750><s%> to this <S%H5750><s%> day, <S%H2088><s%>

The angel <S%H4397><s%> who has redeemed <S%H1350><s%> me from all <S%H3605><s%> evil, <S%H9563><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> the lads; <S%H5288><s%> And may my name <S%H8034><s%> live <S%H7121><s%> on in them, And the names <S%H8034><s%> of my fathers Abraham <S%H1><s%> and Isaac; <S%H85><s%> And may they grow <S%H3327><s%> into a multitude <S%H1711><s%> in the midst <S%H7230><s%> of the earth. <S%H7130><s%>"

When Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that his father laid <S%H1><s%> his right <S%H7896><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> on Ephraim's head, <S%H3027><s%> it displeased <S%H7218><s%> him; and he grasped <S%H7489><s%> his father's hand <S%H8551><s%> to remove <S%H3027><s%> it from Ephraim's head <S%H5493><s%> to Manasseh's head. <S%H7218><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, "Not so, <S%H1><s%> my father, for this <S%H3651><s%> one <S%H1><s%> is the first-born. Place <S%H2088><s%> your right <S%H2088><s%> hand <S%H7760><s%> on his head. <S%H3225><s%>"

But his father refused <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H3985><s%> "I know, <S%H559><s%> my son, <S%H3045><s%> I know; <S%H1121><s%> he also <S%H3045><s%> shall become <S%H1571><s%> a people <S%H1961><s%> and he also <S%H5971><s%> shall be great. <S%H1571><s%> However, <S%H1431><s%> his younger <S%H199><s%> brother <S%H9512><s%> shall be greater <S%H251><s%> than <S%H1431><s%> he, and his descendants <S%H4480><s%> shall become <S%H2233><s%> a multitude <S%H1961><s%> of nations. <S%H4393><s%>"

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> them that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "By you Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall pronounce <S%H1288><s%> blessing, <S%H1288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'May God <S%H430><s%> make <S%H7760><s%> you like Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh! <S%H4519><s%>'" Thus he put <S%H7760><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am about to die, <S%H4191><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> will be with you, and bring <S%H7725><s%> you back <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of your fathers.

"And I give <S%H5414><s%> you one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H7926><s%> more <S%H5921><s%> than <S%H5921><s%> your brothers, <S%H251><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I took <S%H3947><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> with my sword <S%H2719><s%> and my bow. <S%H7198><s%>"
